actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to provide renters with a credit against income tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow as a credit against the personal income tax an amount equal to five percent of the rental payments made by a taxpayer for his principal residence. Limits such credit to $50 for an individual and $75 for a married couple filing a joint return.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to provide renters with a credit against income tax.
